title: Rename 'MANAGE REVIEWS' navigation option to 'Movie Reviews'

requirements.text: Rename the navigation option currently labeled 'MANAGE REVIEWS' to 'Movie Reviews' in all places it appears in the frontend (Header navigation, Footer navigation links, and any other UI references).

quotes: Change the option name MANAGE REVIEWS to Movie Reviews

acceptanceCriteria: The navigation item previously labeled 'MANAGE REVIEWS' now displays as 'Movie Reviews'
The label change is reflected in both desktop and mobile navigation in the Header component
The label change is reflected in the Footer component if it appears there
Clicking the renamed 'Movie Reviews' link still navigates to the same admin reviews page
No other navigation labels are changed

nonGoals: Changing the route path or URL for the admin reviews page
Modifying any backend logic or data models
